mapper.select: SELECT bno, bindex, btitle, substr(bdate, '1', '10' ) as bdate FROM board where bindex = #{bindex} ORDER BY bno DESC limit 0, 5;
SELECT reader as cidx, ridx as aidx from boardreader where bindex = #{index};
SELECT writer as cidx, widx as aidx from boardwriter where bindex = #{index};
SELECT btname from boardtype where bindex = #{bindex};
